description: Solid basic knowledge about JAVA
Familiar with multithreaded programming
Familiar with container programming techniques,etc. List、Set、Map
Good object-oriented programming habits
Be able to write scripts for database operations
Be able to write scripts to automate page test
To be able to use the PHP build simple backend program interact with the database, apply colours to a drawing template
Understand the basic use of CodeIgniter framework
Able to write simple crawler, data processing and other scripts
One year experience in using Linux, familiar with the commonly used commands
To be able to use Markdown document, good technical communication skills
Daily use OS X, using the Git + Atom for development, willing to try new things

item.name: Resume

Read the JSON data, use Jade template engine, Less CSS preprocessor
Using Gulp generated Pages, and deploy to making Pages
